overview:
Fiona Kearns is Blueface Chief Executive Officer with responsibility for operations, finance, sales and HR.

Fiona completed her BA in History, Sociology and Politics from NUI Galway in 1997 and also holds a Higher Diploma in Business and IT from Dublin Business School (2001). Fiona has a range of commercial experience in IT Training and IP Telephony and Networking. Fiona joined the Blueface Board in 2008, and has performed a variety of roles within the company including Operations Manager since joining the company in 2005.
